title: Father & daughter found dead in Kalutara
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Two bodies of a father aged 69-years and a daughter aged 33-years were found in a house in the Hinatiyangala area in South Kalutara South last night (30).
The father was found dead on a chair in the house and the daughter was found dead in the living room, said Sri Lanka Police.
The bodies were taken to the Kalutara Nagoda General Hospital morgue last night.
Police are conducting further investigation to find out whether the deaths were the result of murder or suicide.
Key State Institutions gazetted under President; PM gets Central Bank.
General Shavendra Silva – The new Chief of the Defence Staff.
WEATHER: Wind speeds up to 50 kmph / 100 mm rainfall expected
